verses.verse: Save <WH3467> me <WH430>, O God, by your name <WH8034>, and judge <WH1777> me by your strength <WH1369>.
Hear <WH8085> my prayer <WH8605>, O God <WH430>; give ear <WH238> to the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310>.
For strangers <WH2114> are risen up <WH6965> against me <WH6184>, and oppressors seek <WH1245> after my soul <WH5315>: they have not set <WH7760> God <WH430> before them <WH5542>. Selah.
Behold <WH430>, God is my helper <WH5826>: the Lord <WH136> is with them that uphold <WH5564> my soul <WH5315>.
He shall reward <WH7725> evil <WH7451> unto my enemies <WH8324>: cut them off <WH6789> in your truth <WH571>.
I will freely <WH5071> sacrifice <WH2076> unto you <WH3034>: I will praise your name <WH8034>, O Lord <WH3068>; for it is good <WH2896>.
For he has delivered <WH5337> me out of all trouble <WH6869>: and my eye <WH5869> has seen <WH7200> his desire upon my enemies <WH341>.
